title: Executive Defence Strategy Brief
executive_summary: Prioritize diversion-first resolution while preserving fallback plea leverage.
Close brief-disclosure gaps before substantive admissions.
Maintain documented compliance posture to support mitigation credibility.
strategic_priorities: Secure complete brief and disclosure register.
Finalize diversion package with verified supporting records.
Prepare fallback mitigation bundle for contested outcomes.

risk_matrix.mitigation: File targeted disclosure request and tracking log
Obtain dated certificates and attach provenance

citations.note: Primary factual chronology and action status.
Authority for mens rea framing in road matters.
